page.content: {Rippin_Structural Steel Buildings. Rippin's main market in Fife is on the agricultural side. Their structures are used by farmers for trctor sheds, barns, potato stores and grain stores to name but a few. Each building is custom made to each buyer's requirements and in the case of farming Rippin tries to make its buildings blend in with existing structures, as well as with the countryside. Ninety percent of the farms within a 80 km radius of Auchtermuchty will have at least one Rippin structure. 1984 was a good year for Rippin's. Its output of steel structures rose from 6000 tonnes in 1983 to 7000 tonnes and already the prospect is for yet another increase in output to between 8000 and 8500 tonnes in 1985.
